message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product, and I think it's worth every penny. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it carefully.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm not willing to pay that much. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product.

I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $16000. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $14000 for the product.

I'm not willing to go as low as $14000, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $16500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a great deal for you
